title: Sun Transit in the 8th House for Capricorn Ascendant
summary: As the Sun transits the 8th house for Capricorn Ascendant, focus shifts toward transformation, shared resources, hidden matters, and inner strength. This phase brings deep introspection and forces you to confront control, power, and vulnerability. Sudden changes related to finances, authority, or joint responsibilities may arise. While this transit can feel intense, it strengthens resilience and the ability to handle crises with maturity. Growth comes by releasing rigid control and developing trust, discipline, and strategic patience in complex situations.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Need to accept change with maturity

sections.title: Career
points: Involvement in confidential or strategic work
Avoid authority clashes in sensitive matters

sections.title: Relationships
points: Possible dominance issues in close bonds

sections.title: Finance
points: Focus on shared finances or investments

closing: This Sun transit pushes Capricorn Ascendants toward inner transformation. Acceptance and discipline turn intense changes into lasting inner strength.
